participant_1.name: Evelyn
participant_1.personality: Evelyn is reflective and enjoys sharing her experiences. She is warm-hearted and loves to engage in conversations about travel and literature.
participant_1.background: i think i'll retire in a few years. i'm a librarian. i am 60 years old. i really like to travel.

participant_2.name: Mark
participant_2.personality: Mark is energetic and enthusiastic, always ready to support his kids and engage in community activities. He has a friendly and approachable demeanor.
participant_2.background: coffee is my preferred beverage. i coach little league baseball. i have five sons. i drive a mini van. i also like a glass of wine in the evenings.
